titles.title: Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
An original bill making appropriations for the Department of the Interior, environment, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: Committee on Appropriations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski. With written report No. 119-46.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 124.
